definitions.definition: A drug derived from quinolone that is taken orally in the form of its sulfate C 18 H 26 ClN 3 O·H 2 SO 4 to treat malaria , rheumatoid arthritis , and lupus erythematosus .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A drug derived from quinolone that is taken orally in the form of its sulfate C 18 H 26 ClN 3 O·H 2 SO 4 to treat malaria , rheumatoid arthritis , and lupus erythematosus .
